title: Pimento Cheese Recipe
full_text:
Pimento Cheese Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
15 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
10
to 12 servings
Makes
3 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
pound
sharp cheddar cheese
, grated
1
cup
mayonnaise
1
(7-ounce) jar
pimentos
, drained and finely diced
1/2
teaspoon
hot sauce
1/2
teaspoon
cayenne pepper
Directions
In a medium bowl mix together cheese, mayonnaise, pimentos, hot sauce, and cayenne. Serve immediately or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week.
